message: I have a great deal for you on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
That price is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $80 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $80 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate you meeting me closer to the middle.  How about we settle at $95?
I can see you're still a bit short of my minimum price, but I'm willing to be flexible. I can offer it to you for $115.
